Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: This looks to me more likely to be a bug in *fabric-test/tools/PTE/pte-execRequest.js*. It is passing *undefined* as an argument to both *Channel.removeOrderer()* and *Channel.removePeer()*. The argument should be an Orderer and a Peer object respectively. Also, that test code is not handling promise rejections and letting them fall out to the Node runtime.
